page.description: Edit data in an existing form instance specified by the `-formInstanceId-`.

argument.name: formInstanceId
argument.description: formIntanceId of the form instance whose data should be changed

argument.name: formDataJSON
argument.description: Updated form data for the form instance

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: rowsUpdated
property.description: number of rows in the forms table that were updated

section.title: Node
Xbasic
